title: Plate, "All Union Agricultural Exhibition 1939", 1939
markings: Marks: On underside: Dulevo factory mark stamped in orange overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular; scene of large pavilion ornamented at center with Soviet insignia, on left side with map and inscription (in Russian) "Kazan", and on right side with quote from Stalin (in Russian) translated roughly "We don't want a centimeter of anybody's land, but we won't give up any of our own land to anybody; underneath pavilion the inscription (in Russian) "Pavilion D V / All Union Agricultural Exhibition 1929"

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "All Union Agricultural Exhibition 1939", 1939.
1939. porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-32.
